name: Elettronica
membership: AIAD, Confindustria, EOS (European Organization for Security)
goal: Elettronica, founded in 1951, is one of the European leaders in the production of Electronic Defence equipment (EW). Elettronica supplies all solutions, systems and products in the EW field: from interception capacity during law enforcement operations to surveillance of risk areas, to the self-protection of platforms in hostile zones, up to monitoring the electro-magnetic scenario. The Company's systems are in service with the Armed Forces of 28 countries in 5 continents.
interests: Budget, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: H2020, Security including Border management, Security Research, Cyber Security, Defense, EU Maritime policy, Civil Protection and Crisis management, Cohesion Policy, Neighboring policy
